help.description: Print all commands and their descriptions ('-a' => Show description, '-l' => Print list)

cat.description: Print file or load picture, pictures can be load from other websites

tree.description: Show directories contents organized as tree (from '/')

cin.description: Call function 'funcName' with parameters 'InputData' ('$0' = undefined, parameters declare by comma)

run.description: Redirect to the specific website 'URL' or project

use.description: Change command field to the specific command for this API

example.description:
Show example for all commands
 Also used for testing purpose

watch.description: Execute a function/variable and show its output (Stop - CTRL+D)

show.description: Display text word by word with certain speed (Interactive func)
